Graphs.Title: CPU usage
Graphs.Query: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace='${MODEL_NAMESPACE}'}* on(namespace,pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace='${MODEL_NAMESPACE}', workload=~'${MODEL_NAME}-predictor-.*', workload_type=~'deployment'}) by (pod)

Graphs.Title: CPU usage
Graphs.Query: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace='${MODEL_NAMESPACE}', container!='', image!=''} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster='', namespace='${MODEL_NAMESPACE}', workload=~'${MODEL_NAME}-.*', workload_type=~'deployment'}) by (pod)
